ComicInfo.Title: Red and Black Is the New Green
ComicInfo.Summary:
Guest-starring Green Lantern! Black and red are kind of Harley Quinn’s thing…so when the most unique power ring in the universe crosses her path, she has no choice but to put it on, right? Unfortunately for Harley—and everyone else—this hybrid ring is fueled by rage and death…and things are gonna get out of hand very quickly!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Amanda Conner & Paul Mounts | 1 | Var | 1:25 Variant | John Timms | 2 | Note: The digital edition (2/3/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 20:43:48. [CVDB514214]

ComicInfo.Editor: Chris Conroy, Dave Wielgosz, Mark Doyle

ComicInfo.Teams: Blue Lantern Corps, Green Lantern Corps, London Legion of Superheroes, Red Lantern Corps
ComicInfo.Locations: Mojave Desert, New York City, New York State
